title: Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site: Join Our Friends
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park     Join Our Friends              Join Our Friends       The Friends of Saint-Gaudens The Friends of Saint-Gaudens was formed by the Saint-Gaudens Memorial to help support the park. The Friends work with the National Park Service to create interesting and exciting events for visitors, such as the Sculptural Visions event, sculpture workshops, summer concerts, contemporary art exhibits, and even special bus tours. To find out about joining the Friends, please go to their website at www.sgnhs.org, or contact them at: The Saint-Gaudens Memorial 34 South Highland Avenue Ossining, NY 10562 (914) 944-1608 Sgmemorial@aol.com
